entities.name: voldemort
entities.description: Voldemort is mentioned as the target that Harry is trying to find and confront.

entities.name: james
entities.description: James is one of the people walking with Harry, providing him with courage.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is another person walking with Harry, giving him strength.

entities.name: lupin
entities.description: Lupin is a member of the group accompanying Harry, contributing to his courage.

entities.name: lily
entities.description: Lily is part of the group supporting Harry on his journey.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of the people who feels like a ghost to Harry.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is another person in the group that Harry perceives as distant.

relationships.description: James and the others provide courage to Harry, helping him to keep moving forward.
Sirius is another source of strength for Harry.
Lupin contributes to Harry's courage and motivation.
Lily is part of the group that gives Harry the strength he needs.
Ron feels distant to Harry, as if a ghost.
Hermione is also perceived by Harry as being far away.
James and Lily are walking together with Harry, providing him with support.
Sirius and Lupin are also accompanying Harry on his journey.
